59f3aff78bf5501e050f348b.name: Golden Aegis
59f3aff78bf5501e050f348b.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f348b.tooltip: Grants a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}% max Health] for each nearby enemy champion) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff58bf5501e050f3479.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3479.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3479.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next {{ e9 }} seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for {{ e8 }} seconds.

59f3aff58bf5501e050f347a.name: Volcanic Rupture
59f3aff58bf5501e050f347a.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f347a.tooltip:
Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and slows by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. A magma pillar then forms at the fissure's end for {{ e3 }} seconds.

16

59f3aff78bf5501e050f3485.name: Triggerseed
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3485.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3485.tooltip:
Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Can also be cast on Daisy.

59f3aff78bf5501e050f3488.name: Rune Prison
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3488.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3488.tooltip: Instantly root an enemy for {{ e1 }} second and deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f3484.name: Cocoon / Rappel
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3484.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3484.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

59f3aff78bf5501e050f3489.name: Seismic Shard
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3489.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3489.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f3483.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3483.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3483.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

59f3aff78bf5501e050f348a.name: Brutal Strikes
59f3aff78bf5501e050f348a.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f348a.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield holds, this bonus is tripled to {{ e1 }}% ({{ f3 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f3482.name: Dredge Line
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3482.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor and the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3482.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

59f3aff68bf5501e050f347d.name: Emperor's Divide
59f3aff68bf5501e050f347d.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f347d.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies will be stopped by Emperor's Divide, even if they attempt to dash over the wall, but Azir and his allies can pass freely through it.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

59f3aff58bf5501e050f347c.name: Call of the Forge God
59f3aff58bf5501e050f347c.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f347c.tooltip:
Ornn summons a massive lava elemental which stampedes toward him. Enemies run over by the elemental take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage, are slowed by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds and become Brittle for {{ f10 }} seconds.

Ornn can recast this ability to smash into the elemental to redirect and empower it. The empowered elemental knocks up enemies for 1.5 seconds, deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and applies Brittle.

59f3aff78bf5501e050f3486.name: Fate's Call
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3486.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3486.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable and pacified.

The Oathsworn may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking all enemies in a small radius back.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1100 units for her to cast this ability.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f3480.name: The Quickness
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3480.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3480.tooltip:
Gain {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Touching enemies deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms them for {{ e3 }} second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan {{ e6 }}% decaying movement speed.

59f3aff58bf5501e050f3477.name: Explosive Charge
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3477.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3477.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. Each attack and ability charges the bomb's damage by +{{ e6 }}%.

At 4 charges, the bomb explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f347e.name: Relentless Pursuit
59f3aff68bf5501e050f347e.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f347e.tooltip:
Quickly dashes a short distance.

Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second (doubles to {{ e2 }} seconds against champions).

59f3aff78bf5501e050f3487.name: Twin Fang
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3487.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
59f3aff78bf5501e050f3487.tooltip:
Deal {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a target. If the target is killed by Twin Fang, or is killed during its flight, Cassiopeia gains {{ cost }} Mana.

If the victim is Poisoned when Twin Fang hits, it takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and Cassiopeia heals for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }}).

59f3aff58bf5501e050f3478.name: Grand Challenge
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3478.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f3478.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on target champion, for a potential {{ f8 }}% max health true damage.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in {{ e1 }} seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ f9 }}) each second for between {{ e9 }} to {{ e6 }} seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f347f.name: Grand Entrance
59f3aff68bf5501e050f347f.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f347f.tooltip: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking up enemies for {{ e3 }} second.

59f3aff68bf5501e050f3481.name: Eye of Destruction
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3481.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
59f3aff68bf5501e050f3481.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%. This slow decays rapidly.

59f3aff58bf5501e050f347b.name: Bellows Breath
59f3aff58bf5501e050f347b.description: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
59f3aff58bf5501e050f347b.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forwards unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself for {{ f5 }} (12% max health) for {{ e5 }} seconds. The fire deals up to {{ e0 }}% of the enemy's current health as magic damage (minimum {{ e3 }}).

Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for {{ f9 }} seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals {{ f8 }}% of their max health as magic damage.

16

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f3.name: Living Forge
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f3.description:
Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, masterwork upgrades for some items are available for Ornn and his team to purchase.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a72.name: Frostfang
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a72.description:
+20 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing minions slows Tribute generation.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b78.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk
59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b78.description:
+325 Health
+20% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b79.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk
59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b79.description:
+325 Health
+20% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b76.name: Circlet of the Iron Solari
59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b76.description:
+45 Armor
+75 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Active: Grants a decaying shield to nearby allied champions for 2.5 seconds that absorbs up to 38 (+22 per level) (+2%~36% of your bonus health) damage (90 second cooldown).

Shield per level uses the higher of your level or the target's level.
Shield ratio scales with your level.
Shield amount is reduced to 50% if the target has been affected by another Locket of the Iron Solari in the last 8 seconds.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2abc.name: Knight's Vow
59f3af888bf5501e050f2abc.description:
+350 Health
+40 Armor
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active: Designate an allied champion as your Partner (90 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive: If your Partner is nearby, gain +20 additional Armor and +15% Movement Speed towards them.
UNIQUE Passive: If your Partner is nearby, heal for 12% of the damage your Partner deals to champions and redirect 12% of the damage your Partner takes from champions to you as true damage (healing and damage redirection are reduced by 50% if you are ranged).

(Champions can only be linked by one Knight's Vow at a time.)

59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b77.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk
59f3af8a8bf5501e050f2b77.description:
+325 Health
+20% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6f.name: Frost Queen's Claim
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6f.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Summon 2 icy ghosts for 6 seconds that seek out nearby enemy champions. Ghosts reveal enemies on contact and slow them by 40% for between 2 and 5 seconds based on how far the ghosts have traveled (90 second cooldown).
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.
